Abstract.AbstractText: Peripartum cardiomyopathy is a rare cardiac condition, overall. However, in certain populations can be found frequently enough and the signs, symptoms, and management should be readily understood. Here we provide an updated overview of this topic.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Division of Cardiology, Emory University Hospital, Atlanta, Georgia.
Division of Cardiology, Emory University School of Medicine, Grady Memorial Hospital, Atlanta, Georgia.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: The authors declare no potential conflicts of interest.
